Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Elm
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Clark, Oak Street and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Division/Elm.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Clark, Oak Street and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Division/Elm.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
